x=value echo $x.description: PSH correctly implements POSIX command-specific variable assignments where variables are visible to the command, while bash has a bug where they are not expanded
x=value echo $x.bash_behavior: VAR=value echo $VAR outputs empty string (bash bug)

VAR=value echo $VAR.description: PSH correctly implements POSIX command-specific variable assignments where variables are visible to the command, while bash has a bug where they are not expanded
VAR=value echo $VAR.bash_behavior: VAR=value echo $VAR outputs empty string (bash bug)

A=1 B=2 echo $A$B.description: PSH correctly implements POSIX command-specific variable assignments where variables are visible to the command, while bash has a bug where they are not expanded
A=1 B=2 echo $A$B.psh_behavior: Multiple assignments work correctly in PSH
A=1 B=2 echo $A$B.bash_behavior: Multiple assignments don't expand in bash

help.description: PSH and bash both have help but with different output formats
help.psh_behavior: help command shows PSH builtin help
help.bash_behavior: help command shows bash builtin help

pushd.description: PSH pushd behavior may differ in directory stack handling

pushd /tmp.description: Both shells correctly push CWD and change to /tmp. Output differs because PSH and bash run from different working directories in the conformance test environment.
pushd /tmp.psh_behavior: Shows /tmp followed by PSH's CWD on stack
pushd /tmp.bash_behavior: Shows /tmp followed by bash's CWD (temp directory) on stack

popd.description: PSH popd behavior may differ in directory stack handling

echo $$.description: PSH and bash report different process IDs ($$) because they are distinct processes

echo \\$(echo test).description: Both shells reject backslash-escaped $( as syntax error with exit code 2. Error message format differs.
echo \\$(echo test).psh_behavior: Syntax error with PSH error format
echo \\$(echo test).bash_behavior: Syntax error with bash error format

version_builtin.description: PSH provides version builtin, bash uses --version flag

heredoc_processing.description: PSH heredoc processing has architectural limitations

interactive_features.description: Some interactive features not fully implemented
